text: Nikolskoye () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Nikolsky Selsoviet, Nurimanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 627 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Saldybash River, 7.5 km from Krasnaya Gorka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nurimanovsky District
title: Nikolskoye, Nurimanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
